topic.title: 4.10.5 A-RWH POSITION (Angle of Rotary Work Head Position)

para.text: A-RWH POSITION (Angle of Rotary Work Head Position)
para.draft-comment: This page should be same as V180I-I1E-XD Slim3n Instruction Manual (EN) chapter 4.10.5

body.para: At what angle the RWH fixture is to be clamp or unclamp can be set for respective model.

para.text: Work Selection Screen can be changed in login level MAKINO / SUPERVISOR.
